title: What Does It Mean to Dream About Kissing Someone? 15 Interpretations

steps.title: Kissing a stranger might mean that you’re hiding your true personality.
steps.content: Kissing a stranger might mean that you’re hiding your true personality. Dreams tell you things your subconscious mind might not pick up on, especially if you tend to avoid your emotions in waking life. Dreaming about kissing a stranger may be a sign to embrace your authentic self, instead of hiding who you are from the world. Be proud of your accomplishments, and feel free to share your unique thoughts and ideas! [1] X Research source If you’re worried about revealing your true personality to people, take it one step at a time. You could start by sharing one of your goals or childhood dreams, or recommend your favorite book, film, or album to someone. To cultivate your true self , develop your own opinions before asking others what they think. Even if your beliefs are less mainstream, it doesn’t automatically mean that they’re “wrong.” Read books, befriend people of different backgrounds, and be confident in your intelligence and capabilities. Alternatively, dreaming about kissing a stranger could be a warning against short-term relationships.

steps.title: Kissing your partner could indicate that you’re in love with them.
steps.content: Kissing your partner could indicate that you’re in love with them. A kiss is a universal expression of love and affection, especially when it comes from your partner. Dreaming about being kissed by your partner may represent a strong emotional connection to them. You feel safe, secure, and appreciated in their arms, and you want them to know how much you adore them. [2] X Research source Alternatively, if your partner isn’t willing to kiss you in the dream, it could mean that you feel neglected or unwanted in waking life.

steps.title: Kissing a close friend may indicate that you're attracted to them.
steps.content: Kissing a close friend may indicate that you're attracted to them. Sometimes, you develop a crush on someone without even realizing it, but your subconscious can give you a push in their direction. Dreaming about kissing a close friend could mean that you have romantic feelings towards them and you wish to take your friendship to the next level . [3] X Research source If you genuinely like someone as more than a friend, reflect on your feelings around them. Do they make you feel giddy or nervous? Are you excited when they text you? If so, interpret your dream as a sign to make the first move. When you’re ready to tell someone you have feelings for them , ask them to meet up in a casual environment like the park or beach. You could say, “This isn’t easy to admit, but I’ve had a crush on you for a while. It’s okay if you don’t feel the same, but I just had to get this off of my chest.”

steps.title: Kissing an ex-friend could be a sign to reconcile with them.
steps.content: Kissing an ex-friend could be a sign to reconcile with them. If you fell out with a friend, they might appear in your dreams because you have unresolved issues. Your subconscious is encouraging you to reflect on your relationship and think about why you drifted apart. Did you stop hanging out with them because of conflicting schedules? Or, were you going through a rough patch? To put your mind at ease, reach out to your friend and make amends with them. [4] X Research source Reconnect with an old friend by sending them a text to see how they’ve been. Share updates about your life, and ask them if they would be interested in hanging out in person. Instead of trying to rekindle your friendship immediately, give the other person space to process the entire situation, especially if you ended things on bad terms. You could preface your invitation to meet up by saying, “No pressure, but I would love to see you in person if you’re interested.”

steps.title: Kissing an ex may be a sign to walk away from things that drain you.
steps.content: Kissing an ex may be a sign to walk away from things that drain you. Whether it’s a job, relationship, or experience, dreaming about kissing your ex might be your subconscious telling you that you deserve better. Instead of holding onto things that no longer serve you, prioritize your well-being and set healthy boundaries . [5] X Research source You could limit your interactions with people who make you feel bad about yourself, or confront them about any pending issues. For instance, you might say, “I feel like you don’t prioritize our relationship, and I’m putting in all the work. It’s extremely draining, so I’m taking a step back until things change.”

steps.title: Kissing someone else’s partner might indicate success in the future.
steps.content: Kissing someone else’s partner might indicate success in the future. If you’ve been struggling in your personal or professional life, the Universe has got your back! Dreaming about kissing someone else’s partner signals luck and prosperity in your next endeavor. Interpret your dream as a sign to put yourself out there and pursue something you’ve always wanted to do. [6] X Research source Create goals for yourself by writing them down, and make a checklist of tasks that will help you achieve them. For instance, if you dream about starting a business, you could develop a product idea, come up with a business plan , and then look for investors.

steps.title: Kissing your boss could be a sign of luck in your professional life.
steps.content: Kissing your boss could be a sign of luck in your professional life. If your kiss was pleasant, your dream might represent luck in the workplace. Perhaps you’ll secure a business deal you’ve been working tirelessly towards or you’ll receive a hefty promotion in the near future! [7] X Research source If your kiss was unpleasant, your dream could be a sign that you’re feeling overwhelmed, powerless, and unappreciated in the workplace.

steps.title: Kissing a celebrity might indicate that you wish to be famous.
steps.content: Kissing a celebrity might indicate that you wish to be famous. Whether it’s Justin Bieber or David Beckham, dreaming about kissing a celebrity often signals that you want to be just like them. Your dream could represent a hidden passion or career you want to explore, so think about the qualities of the particular celebrity in your dreams. [8] X Research source For instance, if you dream about kissing Kevin Hart, your subconscious might be telling you to look into comedy opportunities. Or, if you kissed J.K. Rowling, it could represent your dream of becoming an author.

steps.title: Kissing a pastor might mean you want other people to respect you.
steps.content: Kissing a pastor might mean you want other people to respect you. Since most people view pastors with high regard, a dream about kissing a pastor could indicate that you want others to respect you. To be respected, stand up for yourself and demonstrate self-respect. Instead of trying to please others, communicate your expectations and availability from the start so that people know that you recognize your own value. [9] X Research source If your pastor kisses you in the dream, it might mean that you’re hiding something or suppressing your emotions.

steps.title: Kissing someone of the same gender suggests that you crave connection.
steps.content: Kissing someone of the same gender suggests that you crave connection. This dream might represent your desire for a stronger relationship with people of the same sex. For example, if you’re a girl who only has guy friends, your subconscious might be telling you that you’re looking for more female friendships. Similarly, if you’re a guy with mostly female friends, you might be seeking male friendships. [10] X Research source This dream scenario may also represent suppressed desires or curiosities about dating people of the same sex.

steps.title: A kiss on the forehead may reveal that you’re unhappy with someone.
steps.content: A kiss on the forehead may reveal that you’re unhappy with someone. If you’ve recently had an argument with a colleague or loved one, they might appear in your dreams because you have unresolved issues. Their poor behavior is clouding your mind, so interpret this dream as a sign to confront them and resolve the conflict. [11] X Research source When you decide to approach the other person, remain calm in the situation and allow the other person to speak. Instead of magnifying your differences, try to find common ground so you can reach a compromise.

steps.title: Kissing someone on the cheek may signal that you admire them.
steps.content: Kissing someone on the cheek may signal that you admire them. This dream scenario reflects the adoration, respect, and affection for someone in your life. It means you care deeply about the people close to you, and you empathize with them—if they have a problem, it becomes your problem. [12] X Research source To make someone feel cared for , check up on them often by sending them a quick text. If you haven’t heard from them in a while, you might say, “I haven’t heard from you in a while, so I just wanted to see what you’ve been up to. I hope everything is okay, and you’re doing great!”

steps.title: A kiss on the neck could mean that you’re crazy about someone.
steps.content: A kiss on the neck could mean that you’re crazy about someone. Whether you’re kissing someone’s neck or their kissing your neck, this dream scenario represents your intense desire to be with someone. Maybe you’ve wanted to hook up with them for a while or you crave a deep emotional connection to them. This special someone is probably on your mind all the time, and you can't get enough of them. If you want to attract the other person’s attention, use body language to express your interest in them. For instance, you might maintain eye contact with them and nod while they’re speaking, or flash them a sweet smile when you greet them.

steps.title: A kiss on the lips might mean you want more passion in your life.
steps.content: A kiss on the lips might mean you want more passion in your life. Whether you’re single or in a relationship, dreaming about kissing someone on the lips generally means you’re looking for a romance filled with passion and desire. You want your partner to be absolutely obsessed with you, and nothing less will suffice. [13] X Research source If you’re lacking passion in your current relationship, spice things up by being more adventurous . Take an art class together, go stargazing, or try something new in the bedroom; put in the effort to make romance a part of your daily life, and you’ll see your relationship thrive! If you’re single, interpret your dream as a sign that love is just around the corner. In the meantime, look for non-romantic ways to add passion to your daily life—you might try a new activity that pushes you out of your comfort zone or take classes to explore your passions .

steps.title: A French kiss could be a sign to be honest about your emotions.
steps.content: A French kiss could be a sign to be honest about your emotions. The best relationships are built on open communication, whether they’re platonic or romantic. If you’re denying (or lying) about your feelings, interpret your dream as a sign to come clean to the other person. Let them know what’s on your mind, and use “I” statements to express how you truly feel. [14] X Research source If you have a crush on someone, for example, you could say, “I love hanging out with you, and I think I’ve started developing feelings towards you over the past few weeks.”

steps.title: Dreams about kissing someone can reveal your fears and desires.
steps.content: Dreams about kissing someone can reveal your fears and desires. Depending on the context and placement of the kiss, a dream about kissing someone could indicate your true feelings toward them. Dreams are an extension of your waking life, and they represent what you’re consciously (or subconsciously) thinking about. To interpret your dream , reflect on your emotions throughout the dream and ask yourself: What is my relationship to the person I kissed? Am I attracted to them? Who initiated the kiss? Was the kiss intense and passionate, or uncomfortable and gross?

steps.title: Positive kissing dreams may symbolize love and affection.
steps.content: Positive kissing dreams may symbolize love and affection. In general, a dream about kissing someone you like indicates your admiration for them. Maybe you have hidden feelings toward this person or you’re already in a relationship with them in real life. Regardless of your situation, your subconscious might be encouraging you to follow your heart and act on your desires. [15] X Research source To determine if your dream is positive, think about how you felt during the kiss. If you enjoyed kissing the other person (or wanted to keep kissing them), it’s probably a sign that you’re attracted to them in waking life.

steps.title: Negative kissing dreams might represent your worries and anxieties.
steps.content: Negative kissing dreams might represent your worries and anxieties. If you experience an uncomfortable or unwanted kiss in your dream, it could symbolize your fears about intimacy or commitment. [16] X Research source This usually occurs when you internalize your feelings or go through struggles alone, so interpret your dream as a sign to acknowledge and embrace your emotions. To deal with your emotions , take 10 minutes to write down how you’re feeling each morning. Putting your thoughts on paper can help you process your emotions and find potential solutions to your problems. At the end of the day, dreams can reveal things about yourself that you’re too scared to confront in waking life. Whether you have a pleasant or uncomfortable experience, view your dream as a powerful tool to help you understand your emotions!
